channel.title: Hockey
channel.description: What's everyones favorite hockey teams? I'm just wondering mine is Detroit Red Wings sadly their out of the playoffs :/

item.title: Hockey
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote="`Ryequis, post:34, topic:339752"][quote author=Archer link=topic=436128.msg3204229#msg3204229 date=1273627155]

[quote author=`Ryequis link=topic=436128.msg3204177#msg3204177 date=1273623419]

[quote author=Teh Spede link=topic=436128.msg3203983#msg3203983 date=1273611937]
I love how you automatically call me and Marc Americans! So nice job being a Canadian idiot. It’s people like you that make people like us laugh at you.
[/quote]I called you both Americans because its usually Americans that are always saying Canadian stereotypes, so I just figured.

[quote author=Frell link=topic=436128.msg3203986#msg3203986 date=1273611996]
Because Americans are the only people who ever stereotype everyone else in the world duh
[/quote]I didn’t say they were its just they are usually the ones mostly doing the Canadian stereotypes

Stop whining and drink your maple syrup.

So whats hockey like in good 'ol canfagland?

I’m not whining, and who the fuck drinks maple syrup? are you stupid? also you’re making it sound like hockey is mostly Canadian when yet there’s more American teams so asking what its like in Canada doesn’t make sense its the same thing as it is everywhere its a sport idiot.

[quote author=xx matty xx link=topic=436128.msg3204051#msg3204051 date=1273614478]
is that u koolvin lolo
[/quote]Who’s koolvin?

retard.
[/quote]How so? I make a thread and he replies something completely irrelevant that’s trolling/spamming so no not retarded.

Seriously you guys are fucking immature, no wonder barely anyone comes to this place anymore grow up I highly doubt that’ll happen anytime soon for any of you though. Unhandled is the only mature one who posted in this thread none of you even know me yet you judge/flame me.

Its the internet, get over it. On topic I only like Tampabay lightning.
[/quote]Is that you guy’s answer to everything? “its the internet get over it” I mean that’s like saying just because you’re on the net you don’t have to be mature. Well technically you don’t have to do anything but its still expected on a online community, if you can’t be mature I don’t see the purpose in posting, I mean its true not everyone is the same but that doesn’t mean you have to act like you’re five.[/quote]dude if you don’t mind now i’m gonna go outside and chill with my mates because i actually have a life, i’m actually so cool i’m not even gonna finish this argument bud.

Read full topic

I’m hoping that the Bruins decide to not fuck up against the Flyers and pull out one more win so they can move on… They were up 3-0, they best not lose. 1-0 Flyers in the second currently.

item.title: Hockey
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Tico, post:27, topic:339752”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=436128.msg3204176#msg3204176 date=1273623412]
As for the subject at hand, I don’t really have a ‘favourite’ team, given that it’s a rarely (read: never) televised sport down here.
If I had to pick one though, I guess I’d go for Canada’s team, given that they don’t suck.
[/quote]

Given that the only good Canadian team is Vancouver (inb4 Uriko), Canadian teams are not full of Canadian players. In fact, I could be wrong, but I’m pretty sure the team with the most Canadian players on it would be San Jose, and they’re a good team.

My favorite team is Chicago.[/quote]
I meant your national team when I said that. I don’t know enough about American/Canadian sporting teams to be able to choose a local team to like.

Read full topic

[quote=“Lothy, post:18, topic:339752”]As for the subject at hand, I don’t really have a ‘favourite’ team, given that it’s a rarely (read: never) televised sport down here.
If I had to pick one though, I guess I’d go for Canada’s team, given that they don’t suck.[/quote]

Given that the only good Canadian team is Vancouver (inb4 Uriko), Canadian teams are not full of Canadian players. In fact, I could be wrong, but I’m pretty sure the team with the most Canadian players on it would be San Jose, and they’re a good team.

My favorite team is Chicago.

item.title: Hockey
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Uriko, post:23, topic:339752”]canadiens, habshabshabshabs

i never really used to like hockey but… i guess my canadian side is getting to me nowadays, and im also saddened that op is canadian judging by posts[/quote]
Don’t worry, I feel the same way when I come across an idiot Australian online.

On another note, it would be cool if I could play hockey for fun, but I can’t skate very well. I wouldn’t mind being able to ice skate properly (ie, stopping without having to run into something or someone XD).
